data.name: Death or Glory Demo
data.detailed_description:
In a world where magic and bullets collide, where gods and monsters battle for supremacy, it doesn’t matter if you fight with claws or hammer, with lighting or prayer. Only one can walk away in the ultimate battle for Death or Glory.



Characters fight in a deathmatch, 1 on 1, to determine who will best the other and who will earn the title of eternal glory. Death or Glory is a card game that simulates combat between wildly different characters. Every deck represents the unique attributes and fighting style of the character’s genre, therefore no two opponents will ever play alike.

A Dragon will breathe fire and cause chaos with strong winds, a ninja will poison you with his weapons whilst avoiding your attacks with his agile movements, and a vampire will drain your blood as she goes into a frenzy from her innate bloodlust. Every character has their own attacks and reaction cards that allow them to take the initiative whilst countering incoming threats, making every decision in the battle, possibly your last!

Features



- Brand new Universal Combat System (UCS) that allows EVERY IMAGINABLE character to battle

- Strategic gameplay where every decision matters.

​- East meets West, a multicultural character roster drawn with a comic-inspired art



​- Unique deck with distinctive mechanics for every character



- Arena mode where you battle progressively more powerful opponents with over 20 unique NPCs and 5 powerful bosses in full release

Disclaimer: The Death or Glory Demo is just a representation of our game in an early stage of development. Content release is in the works and performance-related optimization will be conducted before the release of the official game. This demo is designed to perform on high-performance computers with capabilities to run on lower-end devices.

data.short_description: Death or Glory is a dueling card game where fighters compete in an arena. Defeat your opponent with ANY character imaginable with a unique deck embodying that fighting style. Unlock more and more cards to customize your deck on your journey to become the ultimate champion!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
